com.foursquare.geo.shapes.indexing

Class CellLocationReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foursquare.geo.shapes.indexing.CellLocationReference

  • public class CellLocationReference
extends java.lang.Object
    A reference for CellLocations, containing information on the bounding Envelope and the number of levels and their sizes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String AttributePrefix
      The prefix used for identifying indexing attributes in a schema

        public static final java.lang.String AttributePrefix

        See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • CellLocationReference

        public CellLocationReference(org.geotools.geometry.jts.ReferencedEnvelope envelope,
                             int[] levelSizes)
        Creates a new reference
        Parameters:
        envelope - the bounding envelope, which allows points to be associated with their containing CellLocations
        levelSizes - a list representing the maximum depth of the index (length of array) and the 2D branching factor at each level (the value at each index) a quadtree-like index, with a maximum depth of 5 could be realized as new int[]{2, 2, 2, 2, 2}

    • Method Detail

      • fromAttributeName

        public static CellLocationReference fromAttributeName(org.geotools.geometry.jts.ReferencedEnvelope envelope,
                                                      java.lang.String attributeName)
        Deserializes an attribute name into a CellLocationReference
        Parameters:
        envelope - the bounding envelope (e.g. from a Shapefile bounds)
        attributeName - the name (e.g. from a Shapefile schema)
        Returns:
        a CellLocationReference represented by the name
        See Also:
        attributeName()

      • getGeometryFactory

        public com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.GeometryFactory getGeometryFactory()
        The GeometryFactory used when converting index locations to Geometrys
        Returns:
        the geometry factory

      • numLevels

        public int numLevels()
        The maximum depth of the location index, equivalent to the maximum depth of a quadtree-like structure.
        Returns:

      • getLevelSize

        public int getLevelSize(int level)
        The size (2D branching factor) for the given level.
        Parameters:
        level - the level
        Returns:
        the branching factor. A value of 2 would mean 4 children.

      • getEnvelope

        public org.geotools.geometry.jts.ReferencedEnvelope getEnvelope()

      • attributeType

        public java.lang.Class<?> attributeType()
        The class type to use to represent the CellLocation.attributeValue() in a schema. Used for building a new Shapefile schema that includes the index as an attribute.
        Returns:
        the class
